description: The cute, sexy, and flexible Pinky Lee is back at Hogtied. Pinky is a ballet dancer in real life but plays a bondage model on the internet. Her incredible toned and hard body wants to bend into impossible bondage positions; it begs for it. When you work with a girl like Pinky, you have to take advantage of the wonderful gift she brings you. When you get Pinky to model for you, you don’t put her into positions anyone can do, nor do you put her in stocks and just have her stand around. Instead, you do something like this to her. Check it out. Happy Holidays.
title: Pinky Lee
